query: give me top 5 stocks to buy
title: Penny stock under  ₹2 declares an increase of QIP size by  ₹2,500 crore
content: Penny stock under  ₹2: Excel Realty N Infra share price has gained 12% in one month, and has jumped 90% in three months. The penny stock has rallied 138% in six months and has risen 35% on a year-to-date (YTD) basis. Over the past one year, the smallcap stock has surged 128%.
